greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Least number m such that integer part of sigma(m)/phi(m) equals n.
mathematica: t=Table[0, {100}]; Do[c=Floor[DivisorSigma[1, n]/EulerPhi[n]]; If[c<101&&t[[c]]== 0, t[[c]]=n], {n, 1, 100000}]; t
results.author: _Labos Elemer_, Apr 15 2002
ext: Two more terms from _Labos Elemer_, May 18 2004
